name: Police car chase
description:
Police car chase is a car driving simulator. Your task is super simple, run away from cops, collect as much money as you can and survive as long as possible. This sounds very simple, but when you will start playing you will see that it's not so easy. Police cars are hunting you, they will try to smash your car, so you should be very fast and very careful. The police cars is not your only problem, often on your way will appear different obstacles in unexpected places and sometimes even come even the police helicopter, so you should react very fast. And of course, don't forget to collect money. Racing will not have sense, if you will not be able to get a lot of money.

Controls are very simple, constant acceleration and two button controls with fast restart. So, start the game, choose your favorite car and go ahead, show your driving skills, make quick, unexpected turns and remember, one hit and you are dead.Key features of Police car chase game:
  • 23 super 3D fast cars
  • 7 police cars: coupes, pick up trucks, sedans, SWAT vans and helicopters
  • super easy controls
  • nice and simple design
  • funny gameplay
  • multi language support
